title: Wrong Twin
description: AugustHarper Maxwell knows what she wantsâ€¦and that has always been my twin brother Troy.He doesn't deserve her. Never has. Not for the minute and a half they dated in high school and certainly not now. When the only thing on his mind is his pro hockey career and all the women jumping him at every corner.Yet here she is, hoping to run into him at the season opener party. I wasn't gonna show. Not exactly my scene.I'm more about hedge funds and suits than pucks and bunnies.So what do I do when my brother tanks opening game and asks me to take his place to avoid the crowd?And the girl I'd never been able to forget plants a kiss on my lips and tells me to meet her for a private party.HarperAfter tonight, Troy Hartman is going to be the one left with regrets.
author: Roxanne Tully
